CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 17, 1959, pg. 6 reads: "Key Witnesses - Key witnesses in murder trial of Crawford Hines in Criminal Court this week are six-year-old Darnell Graham and his mother, Mrs. Cleo Graham. The incident which led to the fatal shooting of Emanuel Graham, the husband, began at Linton and Heldman's Sts., last fall, when Graham became enraged upon finding his estranged wife and son in another man's car. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Cleo Graham and son Darnell Graham, wearing dark hat with ear muffs, standing in corridor of the Allegheny County Courthouse
